wake up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to stop sleeping, or to make someone stop sleeping
wake up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I’ll wake you up when it’s time to leave.
wake up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to start to listen or pay attention to something
wake up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Wake up  (=give me your attention) at the back there!
wake up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: used to tell someone to recognize the truth or reality of a situation
